title: Enhancing Peer Feedback Competencies in Multicultural Environments: Application to Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Small-Group, Multicultural Learning Environment Focused on Improving Mathematics Pedagogy Through Peer Feedback

learning_goals: Learners can provide at least three specific and actionable feedbacks on peers' mathematics lesson designs
Learners demonstrate feedback acceptance attitudes reflecting diverse cultural perspectives with over 80% participation rate
Learners analyze peer feedback results and apply at least two improvements to their own lesson designs

resources: Online Feedback Platform (e.g., Google Docs, Padlet)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
